meaningMnemonic: You lift the <radical>lid</radical> off a manhole and there's a <radical>towel</radical> with the name of a <kanji>city</kanji> on it.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>city</kanji> must have a lot of <reading>shee</reading>p (し) because there is a sheep monogram on the towel. It's the sheep city.
